g.text: ​The setting is identical to PH (0-5 cm)
for the rest of the soil
​Raster layers areSoil (5-15 cm) PH Value, Soil (15-30 cm) PH Value, Soil (30-60 cm) PH Value, Soil (60-100 cm) PH Value, andSoil (100-200 cm) PH Value, respectively.
​Output column prefixes are PHd2 for 5-15 cm,PHd3 for 15-30 cm, PHd4 for 30-60 cm, PHd5 for 60-100 cm, andPHd6 for 100-
The setting is identical toRec PH (0-5 cm)for the rest
​Fields to reclassify are PHd2_mean for 5-15 cm, PHd3_mean for 15-30 cm, PHd4_mean for 30-60 cm, PHd5_mean for 60-100 cm, and PHd6_mean for100-200 cm, respectively.
​Output column names are PHd2_r, PHd3_r, PHd4_r, PHd5_r, and PHd6_r, respectively.
​Input layer: 'Output layer' from algorithm 'Rec PH (100-200 cm)’
